hero.defaultTitle: 电子雾化设备及新型烟草产品

services.title: 为全球客户提供一站式电子雾化设备解决方案定制化服务
services.description1: 致力于电子烟及新型烟草产品的研发、生产和销售。拥有先进的生产设备和完善的质量管理体系，为全球客户提供一流的ODM/OEM服务。
services.description2: 多年产品积累，提供完整的技术解决方案。满足客户对品质（Quality）、性能（Performance）、外观（Design）等全方位需求。全面、多样化、可实现的产品，为全球客户提供专业产品支持。

research.title: 研发技术
research.subtitle: CLOUPOR 科创研究院
research.description1: 拥有强大的研发团队和技术创新能力，建立了完善的产品研发体系和技术创新机制。配备专业的研发实验室和检测中心，为技术创新提供强有力的保障。
research.description2: 通过不断的技术创新，开发出多项具有自主知识产权的核心技术。确保产品性能优异、质量稳定，为客户创造更大价值。持续投入研发，推动行业技术进步。

manufacturing.subtitle: 自动化设备研发
manufacturing.description: 建立了完善的智能制造体系，引进先进的自动化生产线和智能检测设备，确保产品质量和生产效率。

hero.defaultTitle: Electronic Atomization Devices & New Tobacco Products

services.title: Providing Global Customers with One-Stop Electronic Atomization Device Solutions and Customization Services
services.description1: Dedicated to R&D, production and sales of e-cigarettes and new tobacco products. With advanced production equipment and comprehensive quality management system, we provide world-class ODM/OEM services to global customers.
services.description2: Years of product accumulation, providing complete technical solutions. Meeting customer needs in Quality, Performance, and Design. Comprehensive, diverse, and achievable products providing professional product support to global customers.

research.title: R&D Technology
research.subtitle: CLOUPOR Innovation Research Institute
research.description1: With a strong R&D team and technological innovation capabilities, we have established a comprehensive product development system and innovation mechanism. Equipped with professional R&D laboratories and testing centers to provide strong support for technological innovation.
research.description2: Through continuous technological innovation, we have developed multiple core technologies with independent intellectual property rights. Ensuring superior product performance and stable quality, creating greater value for customers. Continuous R&D investment driving industry technological progress.

manufacturing.subtitle: Automated Equipment Development
manufacturing.description: Established a comprehensive smart manufacturing system, introducing advanced automated production lines and intelligent testing equipment to ensure product quality and production efficiency.
manufacturing.innovationText: Dedicated R&D team for continuous innovation
